name: Bone Head
description:
- Controls -
Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, Enter to pause and exit stage

- Bone Head -
Bone Head is a fast paced, timed, retro platformer. Run, jump and wall-jump your way to the goal as fast as possible. Collect oranges if you want an extra challenge! 
See your times and orange collections while traversing the world map.
Can you 3 star every level?

This game was created as my introduction to Pico-8, a fantasy console that thrives off of limitations. Hope you enjoy!
